a new reward address to the list, which will receive fees collected from the bridge operations. Only the owner can call this method.","params":{"_addr":"new reward account."}},"blockRewardContract()":{"details":"Retrieves address of the currently used block reward contract.","return":"address of block reward contract."},"bridgeContract()":{"details":"Get the AMB interface for the bridge contract address","return":"AMB interface for the bridge contract address"},"calculateFee(bytes32,uint256)":{"details":"Calculates the amount of fee to pay for the value of the particular fee type.","params":{"_feeType":"type of the updated fee, can be one of [HOME_TO_FOREIGN_FEE, FOREIGN_TO_HOME_FEE].","_value":"bridged value, for which fee should be evaluated."},"return":"amount of fee to be subtracted from the transferred value."},"claimTokens(address,address)":{"details":"Allows to transfer any locked tokens or native coins on this contract.","params":{"_to":"address that will receive the locked tokens on this contract.","_token":"address of the token, address(0) for native coins."}},"decimalShift()":{"details":"Returns the value of foreign-to-home decimal shift.","return":"decimal shift."},"fixFailedMessage(bytes32)":{"details":"Handles the request to fix transferred assets which bridged message execution failed on the other network. It uses the information stored by passMessage method when the assets were initially transferred","params":{"_messageId":"id of the message which execution failed on the other network."}},"fixMediatorBalance(address)":{"details":"Allows to send to the other network the amount of locked native tokens that can be forced into the contract without the invocation of the required methods.","params":{"_receiver":"the address that will receive the tokens on the other network"}},"getBridgeInterfacesVersion()":{"details":"Tells the bridge interface version that this contract supports.","return":"major value of the versionminor value of the versionpatch value of the version"},"getBridgeMode()":{"details":"Tells the bridge mode that this contract supports.","return":"_data 4 bytes representing the bridge mode"},"getFee(bytes32)":{"details":"Retrieves the value for the particular fee type.","params":{"_feeType":"type of the updated fee, can be one of [HOME_TO_FOREIGN_FEE, FOREIGN_TO_HOME_FEE]."},"return":"fee value associated with the requested fee type."},"getNextRewardAddress(address)":{"details":"Retrieves next reward address in the linked list, or F_ADDR if given address is the last one.","params":{"_address":"address of some reward account."},"return":"address of the next reward receiver."},"handleBridgedTokens(address,uint256)":{"details":"Handles the bridged tokens. Checks that the value is inside the execution limits and invokes the method to execute the Mint or Unlock accordingly.","params":{"_recipient":"address that will receive the tokens","_value":"amount of tokens to be received"}},"initialize(address,address,uint256[3],uint256[2],uint256,int256,address,address)":{"details":"Stores the initial parameters of the mediator.","params":{"_blockReward":"address of the block reward contract","_bridgeContract":"the address of the AMB bridge contract.","_dailyLimitMaxPerTxMinPerTxArray":"array with limit values for the assets to be bridged to the other network.  [ 0 = dailyLimit, 1 = maxPerTx, 2 = minPerTx ]","_decimalShift":"number of decimals shift required to adjust the amount of tokens bridged.","_executionDailyLimitExecutionMaxPerTxArray":"array with limit values for the assets bridged from the other network.  [ 0 = executionDailyLimit, 1 = executionMaxPerTx ]","_mediatorContract":"the address of the mediator contract on the other network.","_owner":"address of the owner of the mediator contract","_requestGasLimit":"the gas limit for the message execution."}},"isRewardAddress(address)":{"details":"Checks if specified address is included into the registered rewards receivers list.","params":{"_addr":"address to verify."},"return":"true, if specified address is associated with one of the registered reward accounts."},"maxAvailablePerTx()":{"details":"Retrieves maximum available bridge amount per one transaction taking into account maxPerTx() and dailyLimit() parameters.","return":"minimum of maxPerTx parameter and remaining daily quota."},"mediatorContractOnOtherSide()":{"details":"Tells the mediator contract address from the other network.","return":"the address of the mediator contract."},"messageFixed(bytes32)":{"details":"Tells if a message sent to the AMB bridge has been fixed.","return":"bool indicating the status of the message."},"owner()":{"details":"Tells the address of the owner","return":"the address of the owner"},"relayTokens(address)":{"details":"Method to be called to initiate the bridge operation of the native tokens to an erc20 representation that the user will receive in the address specified by parameter on the other network.","params":{"_receiver":"address that will receive the erc20 tokens on the other network."}},"removeRewardAddress(address)":{"details":"Removes a reward address from the rewards list. Only the owner can call this method.","params":{"_addr":"old reward account, that should be removed."}},"requestFailedMessageFix(bytes32)":{"details":"Method to be called when a bridged message execution failed. It will generate a new message requesting to fix/roll back the transferred assets on the other network.","params":{"_messageId":"id of the message which execution failed."}},"requestGasLimit()":{"details":"Tells the gas limit to be used in the message execution by the AMB bridge on the other network.","return":"the gas limit for the message execution."},"rewardAddressCount()":{"details":"Retrieves amount of registered reward accounts.","return":"length of reward addresses list."},"rewardAddressList()":{"details":"Retrieves all registered reward accounts.","return":"address list of the registered reward receivers."},"rewardableInitialize(address,address,uint256[3],uint256[2],uint256,int256,address,address,address[],uint256[2])":{"details":"Stores the initial parameters of the mediator, sets the rewardable mediator as well.","params":{"_blockReward":"address of the block reward contract","_bridgeContract":"the address of the AMB bridge contract.","_dailyLimitMaxPerTxMinPerTxArray":"array with limit values for the assets to be bridged to the other network.  [ 0 = dailyLimit, 1 = maxPerTx, 2 = minPerTx ]","_decimalShift":"number of decimals shift required to adjust the amount of tokens bridged.","_executionDailyLimitExecutionMaxPerTxArray":"array with limit values for the assets bridged from the other network.  [ 0 = executionDailyLimit, 1 = executionMaxPerTx ]","_fees":"array with initial fees for both bridge directions  [ 0 = homeToForeignFee, 1 = foreignToHomeFee ]","_mediatorContract":"the address of the mediator contract on the other network.","_owner":"address of the owner of the mediator contract","_requestGasLimit":"the gas limit for the message execution.","_rewardAddresses":"list of reward addresses, between whom fees will be distributed"}},"setBlockRewardContract(address)":{"details":"Updates an address of the block reward contract that is used for minting native coins.","params":{"_blockReward":"address of new block reward contract."}},"setBridgeContract(address)":{"details":"Sets the AMB bridge contract address. Only the owner can call this method.","params":{"_bridgeContract":"the address of the bridge contract."}},"setFee(bytes32,uint256)":{"details":"Updates the value for the particular fee type. Only the owner can call this method.","params":{"_fee":"new fee value, in percentage (1 ether == 10**18 == 100%).","_feeType":"type of the updated fee, can be one of [HOME_TO_FOREIGN_FEE, FOREIGN_TO_HOME_FEE]."}},"setMediatorContractOnOtherSide(address)":{"details":"Sets the mediator contract address from the other network. Only the owner can call this method.","params":{"_mediatorContract":"the address of the mediator contract."}},"setRequestGasLimit(uint256)":{"details":"Sets the gas limit to be used in the message execution by the AMB bridge on the other network. This value can't exceed the parameter maxGasPerTx defined on the AMB bridge. Only the owner can call this method.","params":{"_requestGasLimit":"the gas limit for the message execution."}},"totalBurntCoins()":{"details":"Retrieves total burnt coins by this bridge.","return":"amount of burnt coins."},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.","params":{"newOwner":"the address to transfer ownership nodes.name: HomeAMBErc20ToNative
initialize
rewardableInitialize

nodes.documentation:
@dev Fallback method to be called to initiate the bridge operation of the native tokens to an erc20 representation
that the user will receive in the same address on the other network.

nodes.name: relayTokens

nodes.documentation:
@dev Updates an address of the block reward contract that is used for minting native coins.
@param _blockReward address of new block reward contract.
nodes.name: setBlockRewardContract

nodes.documentation:
@dev Retrieves address of the currently used block reward contract.
@return address of block reward contract.
nodes.name: blockRewardContract

nodes.documentation:
@dev Retrieves total burnt coins by this bridge.
@return amount of burnt coins.
nodes.name: totalBurntCoins

nodes.documentation:
@dev Validates the received native tokens and makes the request to unlock the erc20 tokens on the other network.
@param _receiver address that will receive the erc20 tokens on the other network.
nodes.name: nativeTransfer

nodes.documentation:
@dev Internal function for updating amount of burnt coins by this bridge.
@param _amount new amount of burned coins.
nodes.name: _setTotalBurntCoins
executeActionOnBridgedTokens
executeActionOnFixedTokens
claimTokens
fixMediatorBalance

nodes.documentation:
@dev Internal function for "burning" native coins. Coins are burnt by sending them to address(0x00..00).
@param _amount amount of native coins to burn.
nodes.name: _burnCoins
onFeeDistribution

onFeeDistribution

addRewardAddress(address).details: Adds a new reward address to the list, which will receive fees collected from the bridge operations. Only the owner can call this method.

blockRewardContract().details: Retrieves address of the currently used block reward contract.

bridgeContract().details: Get the AMB interface for the bridge contract address
bridgeContract().return: AMB interface for the bridge contract address

calculateFee(bytes32,uint256).details: Calculates the amount of fee to pay for the value of the particular fee type.

params._feeType: type of the updated fee, can be one of [HOME_TO_FOREIGN_FEE, FOREIGN_TO_HOME_FEE].
params._value: bridged value, for which fee should be evaluated.

calculateFee(bytes32,uint256).return: amount of fee to be subtracted from the transferred value.

claimTokens(address,address).details: Allows to transfer any locked tokens or native coins on this contract.

params._to: address that will receive the locked tokens on this contract.
params._token: address of the token, address(0) for native coins.

decimalShift().details: Returns the value of foreign-to-home decimal shift.

fixFailedMessage(bytes32).details: Handles the request to fix transferred assets which bridged message execution failed on the other network. It uses the information stored by passMessage method when the assets were initially transferred

params._messageId: id of the message which execution failed on the other network.

fixMediatorBalance(address).details: Allows to send to the other network the amount of locked native tokens that can be forced into the contract without the invocation of the required methods.

params._receiver: the address that will receive the tokens on the other network

getBridgeInterfacesVersion().details: Tells the bridge interface version that this contract supports.
getBridgeInterfacesVersion().return: major value of the versionminor value of the versionpatch value of the version

getBridgeMode().details: Tells the bridge mode that this contract supports.

getFee(bytes32).details: Retrieves the value for the particular fee type.

params._feeType: type of the updated fee, can be one of [HOME_TO_FOREIGN_FEE, FOREIGN_TO_HOME_FEE].

getFee(bytes32).return: fee value associated with the requested fee type.

getNextRewardAddress(address).details: Retrieves next reward address in the linked list, or F_ADDR if given address is the last one.
getNextRewardAddress(address).return: address of the next reward receiver.

handleBridgedTokens(address,uint256).details: Handles the bridged tokens. Checks that the value is inside the execution limits and invokes the method to execute the Mint or Unlock accordingly.

params._recipient: address that will receive the tokens
params._value: amount of tokens to be received

initialize(address,address,uint256[3],ui.details: Stores the initial parameters of the mediator.

params._blockReward: address of the block reward contract
params._bridgeContract: the address of the AMB bridge contract.
params._dailyLimitMaxPerTxMinPerTxArray: array with limit values for the assets to be bridged to the other network.  [ 0 = dailyLimit, 1 = maxPerTx, 2 = minPerTx ]
params._decimalShift: number of decimals shift required to adjust the amount of tokens bridged.
params._executionDailyLimitExecutionMaxPerTxArr: array with limit values for the assets bridged from the other network.  [ 0 = executionDailyLimit, 1 = executionMaxPerTx ]
params._mediatorContract: the address of the mediator contract on the other network.
params._owner: address of the owner of the mediator contract
params._requestGasLimit: the gas limit for the message execution.

isRewardAddress(address).details: Checks if specified address is included into the registered rewards receivers list.
isRewardAddress(address).return: true, if specified address is associated with one of the registered reward accounts.

maxAvailablePerTx().details: Retrieves maximum available bridge amount per one transaction taking into account maxPerTx() and dailyLimit() parameters.
maxAvailablePerTx().return: minimum of maxPerTx parameter and remaining daily quota.

mediatorContractOnOtherSide().details: Tells the mediator contract address from the other network.
mediatorContractOnOtherSide().return: the address of the mediator contract.

messageFixed(bytes32).details: Tells if a message sent to the AMB bridge has been fixed.
messageFixed(bytes32).return: bool indicating the status of the message.

owner().details: Tells the address of the owner

relayTokens(address).details: Method to be called to initiate the bridge operation of the native tokens to an erc20 representation that the user will receive in the address specified by parameter on the other network.

params._receiver: address that will receive the erc20 tokens on the other network.

removeRewardAddress(address).details: Removes a reward address from the rewards list. Only the owner can call this method.

params._addr: old reward account, that should be removed.

requestFailedMessageFix(bytes32).details: Method to be called when a bridged message execution failed. It will generate a new message requesting to fix/roll back the transferred assets on the other network.

params._messageId: id of the message which execution failed.

requestGasLimit().details: Tells the gas limit to be used in the message execution by the AMB bridge on the other network.
requestGasLimit().return: the gas limit for the message execution.

rewardAddressCount().details: Retrieves amount of registered reward accounts.

rewardAddressList().return: address list of the registered reward receivers.

rewardableInitialize(address,address,uin.details: Stores the initial parameters of the mediator, sets the rewardable mediator as well.

params._blockReward: address of the block reward contract
params._bridgeContract: the address of the AMB bridge contract.
params._dailyLimitMaxPerTxMinPerTxArray: array with limit values for the assets to be bridged to the other network.  [ 0 = dailyLimit, 1 = maxPerTx, 2 = minPerTx ]
params._decimalShift: number of decimals shift required to adjust the amount of tokens bridged.
params._executionDailyLimitExecutionMaxPerTxArr: array with limit values for the assets bridged from the other network.  [ 0 = executionDailyLimit, 1 = executionMaxPerTx ]
params._fees: array with initial fees for both bridge directions  [ 0 = homeToForeignFee, 1 = foreignToHomeFee ]
params._mediatorContract: the address of the mediator contract on the other network.
params._owner: address of the owner of the mediator contract
params._requestGasLimit: the gas limit for the message execution.
params._rewardAddresses: list of reward addresses, between whom fees will be distributed

setBlockRewardContract(address).details: Updates an address of the block reward contract that is used for minting native coins.

params._blockReward: address of new block reward contract.

setBridgeContract(address).details: Sets the AMB bridge contract address. Only the owner can call this method.

params._bridgeContract: the address of the bridge contract.

setFee(bytes32,uint256).details: Updates the value for the particular fee type. Only the owner can call this method.

params._fee: new fee value, in percentage (1 ether == 10**18 == 100%).
params._feeType: type of the updated fee, can be one of [HOME_TO_FOREIGN_FEE, FOREIGN_TO_HOME_FEE].

setMediatorContractOnOtherSide(address).details: Sets the mediator contract address from the other network. Only the owner can call this method.

params._mediatorContract: the address of the mediator contract.

setRequestGasLimit(uint256).details: Sets the gas limit to be used in the message execution by the AMB bridge on the other network. This value can't exceed the parameter maxGasPerTx defined on the AMB bridge. Only the owner can call this method.

params._requestGasLimit: the gas limit for the message execution.

totalBurntCoins().details: Retrieves total burnt coins by this bridge.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: the address to transfer ownership to.
